item.description:
Bring your frustrating Revit issues to the meeting and a multi-disciplinary panel of Revit experts will address and try to resolve (along with the rest of the attending Revit experts!).

Panel includes:

Jason Grant, Payette Associates

Pierce Reynoldson, Tocci Building Corporation

Mark Ohanian, WSP Flack + Kurtz

Scott Wilson, LA Fuess

When you RSVP, you'll have a chance to describe your frustrating issue - asking in advance gives our experts a chance to figure it out ahead of time!

 

It's been too long...we look forward to seeing you!
item.name: Ask the Experts : Angry Reviting
